  • Constructor Details

    • APILayer

      public APILayer​(int amountOfThreads, int port, @NotNull @NotNull StorageLayer storageLayer, @NotNull @NotNull java.io.File resourcesLocation) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor for the APILayer class.
      Parameters:
      amountOfThreads - The amount of simultaneous external connections the SimpleAPILayerServer of this instance can handle.
      port - The port on which the SimpleAPILayerServer can run.
      storageLayer - The StorageLayer to consult.
      resourcesLocation - The File location at which the resources of the cloud storage service provider may be stored.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the provided resourcesLocation argument can't be used to store the service provider's resources.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser​(@NotNull @NotNull org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<PrivateEntityIdentifier,​PublicEntityIdentifier> userIdentifiers)
      Method to internally register a user as a registered user of the cloud storage service provider.
      Parameters:
      userIdentifiers - The PrivateEntityIdentifier and PublicEntityIdentifier instances of the new user.
      "API Note:"
      This method does not generate or store a namespace attestation for the StorageLayer.

      public boolean createDirectory​(@NotNull @NotNull FileServerCreateDirectoryRequest request) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IllegalStateException, java.io.IOException
      Description copied from interface: FileServerInterface
      Method to create a directory.
      Specified by:
      createDirectory in interface FileServerInterface
      Parameters:
      request - The FileServerCreateDirectoryRequest instance.
      Returns:
      True if the directory was successfully created, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the file server can not create a directory at the specified location.
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the file server can not create a directory at the specified location.
      java.io.IOException - If an IO-related problem occurred while creating the directory.
